mapper.select: SELECT RN, MOMENTID, WRITER, CATEGORY, LOCATION, TEXT, POSTTIME, CONTENTID, REFERENCEID, CONTENTPATH1, CONTENTPATH2, CONTENTPATH3, CONTENTPATH4, CONTENTPATH5, CONTENTPATH6, CONTENTPATH7, CONTENTPATH8, CONTENTPATH9, CONTENTPATH10 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, M.MOMENTID, M.WRITER, M.CATEGORY, M.LOCATION, M.TEXT, M.POSTTIME, C.CONTENTID, C.REFERENCEID, C.CONTENTPATH1, C.CONTENTPATH2, C.CONTENTPATH3, C.CONTENTPATH4, C.CONTENTPATH5, C.CONTENTPATH6, C.CONTENTPATH7, C.CONTENTPATH8, C.CONTENTPATH9, C.CONTENTPATH10 FROM MOMENT M LEFT JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID AND C.CONTENTTYPE = 1 ORDER BY M.MOMENTID ASC) WHERE RN >= ((#{pageNum} - 1) * 10 + 1) AND RN <= (#{pageNum} * 10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOMENT M JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID WHERE C.CONTENTTYPE = 1

SELECT RN, MOMENTID, WRITER, CATEGORY, LOCATION, TEXT, POSTTIME, CONTENTID, REFERENCEID, CONTENTPATH1, CONTENTPATH2, CONTENTPATH3, CONTENTPATH4, CONTENTPATH5, CONTENTPATH6, CONTENTPATH7, CONTENTPATH8, CONTENTPATH9, CONTENTPATH10 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, M.MOMENTID, M.WRITER, M.CATEGORY, M.LOCATION, M.TEXT, M.POSTTIME, C.CONTENTID, C.REFERENCEID, C.CONTENTPATH1, C.CONTENTPATH2, C.CONTENTPATH3, C.CONTENTPATH4, C.CONTENTPATH5, C.CONTENTPATH6, C.CONTENTPATH7, C.CONTENTPATH8, C.CONTENTPATH9, C.CONTENTPATH10 FROM MOMENT M LEFT JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID AND C.CONTENTTYPE = 1 ORDER BY M.MOMENTID ASC) WHERE LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{momentLocation} || '%' or CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{momentLocation} || '%' or WRITER LIKE '%' || #{momentLocation} || '%'

SELECT M.MOMENTID, M.WRITER, M.CATEGORY, M.LOCATION, M.TEXT, M.POSTTIME, C.CONTENTID, C.REFERENCEID, C.CONTENTPATH1, C.CONTENTPATH2, C.CONTENTPATH3, C.CONTENTPATH4, C.CONTENTPATH5, C.CONTENTPATH6, C.CONTENTPATH7, C.CONTENTPATH8, C.CONTENTPATH9, C.CONTENTPATH10 FROM MOMENT M LEFT JOIN CONTENTSRC C ON M.MOMENTID = C.REFERENCEID AND C.CONTENTTYPE = 1 WHERE M.MOMENTID = #{momentid}
SELECT SMALLCATE FROM CATEGORY WHERE LARGECATE=#{largecate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOMENT (MOMENTID, WRITER, CATEGORY, LOCATION, TEXT, POSTTIME) VALUES ( momentid_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{category}, '부산', #{text}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO CONTENTSRC ( CONTENTID, REFERENCEID, CONTENTTYPE, CONTENTPATH1, CONTENTPATH2, CONTENTPATH3, CONTENTPATH4, CONTENTPATH5,CONTENTPATH6,CONTENTPATH7,CONTENTPATH8,CONTENTPATH9,CONTENTPATH10 ) VALUES ( CONTENTSRC_SEQ.nextval, #{referenceID}, 1, #{contentPath1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentPath10, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(rownum) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM FROM CONTENTSRC)
